desc: Stop flushing trees down the toilet. Make the switch to toilet rolls made from 100% recycled papers to save the trees. Keep the trees in the ground to provide us oxygen and absorb CO2. Our sustainability focused designs created a truly zero waste product. Plastic free packaging and everything is recyclable.

layout.text: 27,000 trees are being cut down everyday to make virgin pulp toilet papers
I WANT TO BE PART OF THE SOLUTION
